title: Man City 2-0 Everton: Erling Haaland looks 'superhuman' but must others step up?
description: Erling Haaland is getting so good he is starting to break his own records, following a double for Manchester City against Everton on Saturday.
content:
Another day, another Erling Haaland masterclass.
There have been only three instances of a player reaching double figures in the Premier League by their eighth appearance of a season:
Erling Haaland in 2022-23
Erling Haaland in 2024-25

title: US Grand Prix sprint: Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri collide as Max Verstappen wins in Austin
description: McLaren team-mates Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris crash out of the United States Grand Prix sprint race in a collision just after the start.
content:
McLaren team-mates and title rivals Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris crashed out of the United States Grand Prix sprint race in a collision just after the start.

title: Biggest US labor unions fuel No Kings protests against Trump: ‘You need a voice to have freedom’
description: More than 2,600 events are planned across the US to dissent against Trump’s policies. Organizer James Phipps, 75, says: ‘Protest is all I’ve done all my life’
content: Recovery from a recent surgery for colon cancer will not stop James Phipps, 75, from attending Saturday’s No Kings demonstration in Chicago, Illinois. “I have a burning desire to be a part of the protest.” he said, “because that’s all I’ve done all m... [5253 chars]

title: Hazrat Shahjalal Airport fire chaos as travellers stranded and flights suspended
description: All flights departing and arriving had to be halted at Hazrat Shahjalal Airport in Dhaka, Bangladesh, today after a massive blaze ripped through part of the terminal
content:
